title: SMC_SetKinConfiguration (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_SetKinConfiguration
This function block sets the configuration used in
the inverse kinematic transformation.
This affects only upcoming movements that are
not programmed in ACS-coordinates.

rows.Name: AxisGroup
rows.Comment: Reference to a group of axis

rows.Name: Execute
rows.Comment: Sets the kinematic configuration on rising edge

rows.Name: Done
rows.Comment: The transformation has been set successfully

rows: Signals that an error has occurred within the function block
